mapper.select: select b.item longtime,a.money,c.REALNAME,d.username NICKNAME,c.sex,(substr(TELEPHONE,1,3)||'****'||substr(TELEPHONE,-4,4)) as TELEPHONE,e.ITEM ACADEMIC,f.item MARRIAGE,g.item HOUSED,c.ADDRESS,c.job,h.item INCOME,d.USERNAME,i.ITEM PURPOSE,j.item REPAYMENTMETHOD from TB_BORROW a join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM b on a.LONGTIME=b.id join TB_REALNAME c on a.REALID=c.id join TB_USER d on c.USERID=d.USERID join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM e on c.ACADEMIC=e.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM f on c.MARRIAGE=f.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM g on c.HOUSED=g.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM h on c.INCOME=h.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM i on a.PURPOSE=i.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM j on a.REPAYMENTMETHOD=j.id where a.realid=#{tendid}
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_INVESTMENTLIST where tendid=#{tendid}
